title: V for victory
creator_credit: Norman McLaren and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: In this film, a publicity message for a war bond campaign, Norman McLaren draws symbols, a stick man, and lettering directly on clear 35mm film stock to synchronize with a brass band rendition of Sousa’s march The Thunderer.
creator_credit_for_label: Norman McLaren and National Film Board of Canada
